name: Xplanet
description:
Xplanet

It multiplayer top-down shooter game developed by me with the help of unreal engine 4 and blender. Game Story Humans visited a planet and started mining for resources. All work is been carried out by robots but after a power failure, all bots get corrupted files which leads to bots going violent and attacking any human seen. Your mission is to eliminate all bots which are affected by corrupt files and make human contact on the planet possible.
